page.title: 12PLYMOUTH AIRPORT
page.content: Plymouth Airport is on the northern edge of the city.It is about half a mile away from Widewell school and just across the main road from the George Hotel.Brymon Airways use the Airport.They have two types of plane: the Dash 7 and Twin Otter.The Dash 7 carries 50 passengers and the Twin Otter carries 20. They both carry cargo,like animals,machinery and other things.The airport cannot grow bigger because it is on a hill with houses nearby. From the airport you can fly to Aberdeen, Cork, Exeter, Jersey, Guernsey, Scilly Isles, Newquay and London. A day return flight to London costs Â£85.Plymouth to Aberdeen single costs Â£76, Day return to Newquay is Â£10, and Plymouth to Exeter single is Â£8.Many people use the airport to go on holiday, but also business people use it for easy travel to London.
